channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-Curriculo Vitae Free

item.title: CVE-2021-24222|2024-08-03T19:21:18.724Z -- unknown -- wp-curriculo%20vitae%20free
item.description: The WP-Curriculo Vitae Free WordPress plugin through 6.3 suffers from an arbitrary file upload issue in page where the [formCadastro] is embed. The form allows unauthenticated user to register and submit files for their profile picture as well as resume, without any file extension restriction, leading to RCE.
